articles.description: Follow live text updates as Chelsea fact Everton in the Premier League, plus watch BBC Radio 5 Live's Monday Night Club.
articles.title: Premier League: Chelsea v Everton - team news & build-up

articles.description: Former England and Kent bowler Derek Underwood dies at the age of 78, the county announces.
articles.title: England and Kent spinner Underwood dies aged 78

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler confirmed himself as the best golfer on the planet with Sunday's Masters victory but Ludvig Aberg's performance should not go unnoticed, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Scottie Scheffler's win at Augusta and Ludvig Aberg's runner-up to be cherished

articles.description: Sunrisers Hyderabad break the record for the highest Indian Premier League total for the second time this season by posting 287-3.
articles.title: Sunrisers hit IPL record score for second time

articles.description: Everton lodge a formal appeal against their second points deduction for breaching the Premier League's financial rules, BBC Radio Merseyside understands.
articles.title: Everton lodge appeal over second points deduction

articles.description: Rafael Nadal says he is "just trying to enjoy every moment" as he returns to the tour for the first time since January.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal confirms appearance at Barcelona Open but suggest 2024 will be his last on tour

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer explains how pressure affected Arsenal and Liverpool in their defeats on Sunday.
articles.title: 'You can hear panic set in' – how pressure is affecting the title race

articles.description: Organisers of the Beijing half marathon will investigate allegations that three African athletes deliberately allowed China's star runner He Jie to win Sunday's race.
articles.title: Beijing half marathon: Organisers investigating controversial finish

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler hails "a special time" for his family after winning second Masters title before the imminent arrival of his first child.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Scottie Scheffler emotional after winning second Green Jacket

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has called for a response from his players after their 2-0 loss to Aston Villa in the Premier League.
articles.title: The moment to stand up is now – Arteta
